name: Alien Fan Game
description:
Press Q to switch between windowed and full screen.

Press R to restart the game.

The character is controlled with WASD to move space to jump and using the mouse to aim.

A retro inspired platformer based on the Alien franchise, it has 1 level and 1 boss fight, it isn't 100% complete most of the enemies don't have death animations, I made it over the course of four days to see how much progress I could make in building a video game within that time period.
